data.title: Walter Sisulu Local Municipality
data.text:
Mayor Cllr Vania Davids

The mayor is the head of administration and has the overarching strategic and political responsibility Walter Sisulu Local Municipality. The Mayor together with the Executive committee have a political responsibility for sound governance and effective service delivery.

The mayor is the first citizen and represents the municipality at ceremonial functions.

The objectives of the office of the mayor are to:
